entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
